pr_title: Add SCIM Group test case to validate #7025

timeline.bodyText: Shall we add a description for the test?
timeline.author: ShanChathusanda93
ShanChathusanda93

timeline.bodyText: Any specific reason to have these as local constants rather than defining globally?
timeline.author: sachiniWettasinghe

replies.bodyText: Added as class level constants in 5f62c85
replies.author: gayashanbc
